entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 4.

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow and local blowing snow beginning overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 28 April 2016
